properties.comment: /** * Persistent classes for a CMDB * * @copyright Copyright (C) 2010-2012 Combodo SARL * @license http://opensource.org/licenses/AGPL-3.0 */

field.filter: SELECT Location AS L WHERE L.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT Model WHERE brand_id=:this->brand_id AND Type=:this->finalclass
SELECT ElectricalConnection WHERE id != :this->id AND location_id = :this->location_id
